name: Sacrificial Goat
description:
Welcome to Sacrificial Goat!

Despite not be a goat, you are at threat of being sacrificed by a cult! Donning definitely-not-cult robes and asking an Ancient Eldritch Being for magical help, you can slip out of the cult's lair. As always, you ignored the fine print and failed to see that using eldritch powers comes at a price!

Find the blue bus in the level to make your stylish getaway!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Melee attack

Shift - Crouch

1 - Power 1 (gain an extra jump, but you cannot crouch)

2 - Power 2 (move faster, but you don't jump as high)

3 - Power 3 (deal double damage with your attack, but take 1 point of damage)

Note: Only one power can be active at a time, and can be used after a 5 second cooldown. Powers last for 5 seconds, and their effects are reversed once they end.

Note part 2: No current way to close the game, you need to use alt+f4
